@yasserogier @stefanbar @cobuspienaar As per Neil, it's not the verifiers job to correct the format of how data is displayed. Its devs job to have proper validation so that data is stored correctly. If dev wonâ€™t make changes to a live system that is in use, they will have to make changes to the actual data as it is imported into the verified table from which it is extracted from.

I honestly donâ€™t see the point in having Attorney CourtWorks live if the data captured by the attorneys are not able to be accepted by the clients.
